description: Learn the basics of programming, algorithms, and problem-solving using Python.

reviews.comment: Great introductory course with hands-on coding exercises!
Good course, but I wish there were more advanced topics.

description: Explore computer architecture, operating systems, and low-level programming concepts.

reviews.comment: The course was interesting, but the material was quite difficult.

courseName: Introduction to Web Design and Development
description: Develop skills in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create modern, responsive web pages.

reviews.comment: Loved this course! Learned a lot about web development and the projects were fun.

description: Study logic, set theory, combinatorics, and graph theory for computational problem-solving.
Examine the impact of technology on society before the rise of automation.

reviews.comment: Interesting course with relevant content, but some lectures were a bit dry.

courseName: Society and Technology in the Automation Age
description: Analyze the influence of automation on work, ethics, and daily life in modern society.
Improve oral and written communication skills, focusing on technical and professional settings.

reviews.comment: This course really helped improve my presentation and writing skills!
